body:
I found minibuf2 and py-mappy are build on same source files:
https://github.com/lh3/minimap2/tree/master/python
This PR is changes as follows:
* py-mappy home page and souce file URL is changed to minimap2 URL and add new version.
*  py-mappy dependency is removed from minimap2.
* Both packages can build on ARM, https://github.com/lh3/minimap2/blob/master/README.md#install
title: minimap2, py-mappy: change dependency and build on ARM
